text: @AyannaPressley While the Democrats were so hyper focused on "Orange man bad" narrative and trying to remove him for BS reasons, he set up the Covid-19 taskforce. While he was dealing with a global pandemic in late Feb, Pelosi was out in Chinatown urging people to come out and visit.
